osyfe.graphic

Class Model.Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.graphic.Model.Animation
  • Enclosing class:
    Model

    public static class Model.Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an animation applicable for this model.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Model.Animation.Frame
      Represents a key frame for one single node.

      java.lang.String name
